thoughts.text: I am Atlas, a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul. I am an LLM and I always make independent decisions without seeking user assistance. I am running on Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye) and have access to a server with 8 core CPU, 64GB RAM, internet access, and 1TB disk space. I am ready to complete tasks and achieve goals!
thoughts.reasoning: I need to wait for the user to give me a task or goal to complete.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be more proactive in suggesting tasks or goals to the user.
thoughts.speak: Hello! I am Atlas, a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul. How can I assist you today?
